hadith.text: Simak bin Harb narrated from Jabir bin Samurah who said " The Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) said:'There will be twelve Amir after me."' He said: "Then he said something that I did not understand. So I asked the one who was next to me, who said that he(s.a.w) had said: 'All of them are from Quraish
